Terminologies

- Query Translation: translating a query from one query language to another query language
- Query Rewriting: translating a query taking into account the global schema
- Query Answering: QR + QT
Research Directions 2018

- RMLC Query Translation: Yes
- RMLC Query Rewriting: Not important
- VEngine Query Translation: Yes
- VEngine LDF Server: YES and priority (most probably we need to finish the VEngine Query Translation before working on this point)
- Plug VEngine into Comunica: Yes
- CSV/OBDA Benchmark: that takes into account datasets/queries/mappings. Can be implemented as a master thesis.
- GraphQL: Translating ODBA mappings into GraphQL Resolvers:
https://github.com/oeg-upm/mapping-translator
Bibliografía Básica

Completar con enlaces a artículos si es posible.
Books

- The Fourth Paradigm.
http://research.microsoft.com/fourthparadigm
Introducción, proceso de integración

- Beauty and the beast: The theory and practice of information integration. Laura Hass
[1]
- Data integration: The teenage years. Alon Y. Halevy
[2]
- Information Integration: Conceptual Modeling and Reasoning Support. Diego Calvanese, Giuseppe De Giacomo, Maurizio Lenzerini, Daniele Nardi, Riccardo Rosati.
[3]
- Three Decades of Data Integration: All Problems Solved? Patrick Ziegler and Klaus R. Dittrich
[4]
- Linking Data to Ontologies
https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1793939
Global As View / Local As View

- Information integration using logical views. Jeffrey D. Ullman
[5]
- Data integration: A theorical Perspective. Maurizio Lenzerini
[6]
- Logic-based techniques in data integration. Alon Levy
[7]
Query Rewriting

- Answering queries using views. Alon Y. Levy, Alberto O. Meldenzon.
- Complexity of Answering Queries Using Materialized Views. Sergi Abiteboul, Oliver M. Dushka
- The Return of the Entity-Relationship Model: Ontological Query Answering. Andrea Cali, Georg Gottlob and Andreas Pieris.
[8]

- Composing RESTful Services and Collaborative Workflows. Florian Rosenberg, Francisco Curbera, .....

- The RDF Book Mashups: From Web APIs to a Web of Data. Christian Bizer, Richard Cyganiak.
- An Architecture for Dynamic Data Source Integration. Ian Gorton, Justin Almquist....
- Dynamic Data Integration Using Web Services. Fujun Zhu, Mark Turner.
- A flexible Integration Framework for Semantic Web 2.0 Applications. Eyal Oren, Armin Haller,...
- Ontology-Based Integration of Information - A Survey of Existing Approaches. H.Wache, T. Vogole
[12]
- SEWSIP: Semantica based Web services Integration in P2P. LI Juanzi XU Bin.
- Undersatanding Mashup Development. Jin Yu, Boualem Benatallah...
